All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary Enum Summary Exception Summary 
    Class Description
    Action
    Abstract class for functions that are needed for all actions
    ActionParserHelper
    This class is made to identify the type of action easily.
    ActionParserHelper.ActionEnum
    Enum for what type of action a given action is Why this exists: So that the concrete Action class can be parsed easily.
    ActionType  
    Attack
    Action that is used for Attacking.
    AttackAction
    Planning action meaning that the bot should send some or all of it's army to fight somewhere.
    AttackActionType
    Description: This class implements the ActionType abstract class from burlap and is used to tell the planner what actions are possible to take at a givens state Why This Exists: To provide the ai planer with possible attacking actions.
    BuildAction
    An Action that involves building a structure for the bot to take.
    BuildActionType
    Description: This class implements the ActionType abstract class from burlap and is used to tell the planner what actions are possible to take at a givens state Why This Exists: To provide the ai planer with possible attacking actions.
    CombatAgent
    Main Class for Combat control.
    CombatUnitStatus  
    DataManager
    Manages the collection of relevant data in the form of DataPoints.
    DataPoint
    Represents relevant information such as current State, executed Action, next State, produced reward, and Q-Value.
    Distance
    Represents a distance between two points.
    DistanceRange
    Represents a range of possible distances and categorizes them into a relative enum.
    DummyQValue
    A bad Q Value class from before we (or at least I) realized that the SparseSampler in burlap already implemented this for us.
    EconomyAgent  
    ExpandActionType
    A class for the expand action for AI Planning.
    GameListener
    Provides the bare minimum to define a BWListener.
    GameStatus  
    GeneralGameKnowledge  
    GeneralRaceProductionKnowledge  
    GoHome
    Action that is used for returning a unit to base.
    GreedyActionChooser
    Selects either the best Action for a specified State or a randomly sampled Action.
    Hp
    Represents the total hp from a group of units.
    HpRange
    Represents a range of possible hp values and categorizes them into a relative enum.
    IncorrectActionTypeException
    The exception that is thrown when there's an unknown ActionType.
    IntelligenceAgent  
    LearningManager
    Manages the learning model, state space, and action chooser.
    ListenerType
    Defines various ListenerTypes to distinguish different versions of GameListener.
    MasterBot  
    MLTrainingListener
    This class is a skeleton of VikingBotListener that allows the ML model to train separately from the AI planning
    MoveTowards
    Action used to MoveTowards the closest enemy unit
    PlanningRewardFunction  
    PlanningState  
    ProtossGeneralKnowledge  
    QTable
    Maps (State, Action) pairs to double values representing the q-value for executing the Action in the specific State.
    QueueComparator  
    Retreat
    Action that is used for moving away from enemy units.
    RewardFunction  
    SARSA
    The main implementation of the SARSA learning algorithm.
    ScoutActionType
    A class for the Scout action for AI Planning.
    SharedPriorityQueue
    A priority queue for the ai planning to communicate with the starcraft bot Works with the StarcraftPlanner to decide what to do next.
    StarcraftEnvironment  
    StarcraftModel  
    StarcraftPlanner  
    State
    Represents a state with all relevant features relating to micromanaging combat.
    StateAction
    Represents a (State, Action) pair.
    StateSpaceManager
    Manages the state space and available actions.
    StrategyAgent  
    TerrenGeneralKnowledge  
    TrainAction
    An Action that involves training a new unit.
    TrainActionType
    Description: This class implements the ActionType abstract class from burlap and is used to tell the planner what actions are possible to take at a givens state How to incorperate new options: Probably would have to restructure the AllApplicableActions function to construct all reasonable possible option combinations How to allow training of new units: copy the second if statement, swap in the new unit's name and you should be good How the training capacaty array is structures: [ workers[used, avail] , ground[used, avail], combat air[used, avail], support air[used, avail]] So, currentCapacity[0][1] is the current capacaity to train new workers (the [0]) that is currently available (the [1]).
    Training
    This class is a skeleton of StrategyAgent that allows the ML model to train separately from the AI planning
    UnitClassification
    Enum to classify units based on their weapon range
    Units
    Represents a collection of units.
    UnitsRange
    Represents a range of possible nearby units and categorizes them into a relative enum.
    UpgradeAction
    This class is meant to work similar to the Train and Build Actions.
    UpgradeActionType
    Currently does nothing as UpgradeAction needs to be better definied to be useful.
    VikingBot
    The main instance of the VikingBot which will handle setting up the agents between games.
    VikingBotInitializer
    Parses command line arguments and initializes the main VikingBot instance.
    VikingBotListener
    The main GameListener used for initializing the agents and updating them every frame.
    ZergGeneralKnowledge
